meanings.definition: A walking stick made from the wood of an ash tree.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa leaned on his trusty ashplant as he strolled through the park.
meanings.sent2: The hiker used an ashplant to help him navigate the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the ashplant for a tasty treat and tried to nibble on it.
meanings.sent4: Her ashplant was like a loyal companion, supporting her every step of the way.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the ashplant made it a unique and cherished possession.

meanings.definition: To beat or strike with an ashplant.
meanings.sent1: The bully threatened to ashplant anyone who dared to challenge him.
meanings.sent2: She carefully ashplanted the rug to remove the dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten playfully ashplanted the toy mouse across the room.
meanings.sent4: His words ashplanted fear into the hearts of his opponents.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the drumsticks ashplanting against the drum echoed through the room.
